about_the_game:
Evelyn, once known as the sexiest woman on the silver screen, now a formidable TV producer. Her relentless interviews often reveal more than her guests anticipate. Off-screen, she delves into yoga, finding tranquility amidst chaos. Would you dare to join her for a yoga session? You may discover more about yourself than you expect.

This DLC contains:
- three new levels to beat
- three new photos to hack.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional nudity, Veiled nudity, General Mature Content
